thread.title: BRIEF-InfraREIT Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.50

title: BRIEF-InfraREIT Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.50
text: March 1, 2018 / 1:32 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-InfraREIT Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.50 Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - InfraREIT Inc: * INFRAREIT REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.22 TO $1.32 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.50 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.42 * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.29 TO $1.39 * ‍ EXPECT TO MAINTAIN CURRENT QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.25 PER SHARE, OR $1.00 PER SHARE ANNUALIZED THROUGH 2018​ * QTRLY NET REVENUE $2.9 MILLION VERSUS $55.2 MILLION * ‍FOOTPRINT PROJECTS CAPEX RANGE OF $70 MILLION TO $180 MILLION FOR PERIOD OF 2018 THROUGH 2020​ * ‍ TCJA REGULATORY ADJUSTMEN WAS A NON-CASH REDUCTION TO REVENUE OF $55.8 MILLION FOR QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
